'''Fate Foretold''' is a permanent event unlocked after the player completes the [[Knights of Favonius (Quest)|Knights of Favonius]] [[Archon Quest]].

==Rewards==
Note that this event does not directly give the player any rewards. It is only a list of requirements needed for four major [[Character]] and [[Weapon]] rewards that can be obtained throughout the [[Prologue]].

|}
